DOC.brief_summary: Patients receiving oral anticoagulation or anti-platelet therapy are at high risk of hematoma after device implantation. This study intends to examine the efficacy of the TopClosure(c) System in wound healing in these patients.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of TopClosure(C)System in Healing Complicated Pacemaker Wounds
DOC.criteria: Patients treated with anticoagulant therapy Patients treated with antiplatelet therapy
